Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: EB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 100th and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 100th and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
